selfdrivebot:
Use this file to define custom functions and blocks.
Read more at https://makecode.microbit.org/blocks/custom
selfdrivebot.init_tracking_sensors|param: left tracking sensor pin, ex: AnalogPin.P8
right tracking sensor pin, ex: AnalogPin.P9
selfdrivebot.init_us_sensor|param|echo: echo ultrasound sensor pin, ex: AnalogPin.P10
selfdrivebot.init_us_sensor|param|trig: trigger ultrasound sensor pin, ex: AnalogPin.P3
selfdrivebot.move_backward: Moves backward the motor at the given speed
selfdrivebot.move_forward: Moves forward the motor at the given speed
selfdrivebot.steer: Steers two motors by the given ratio
